troubleshooting.label: Troubleshooting
troubleshooting.description: Various ways in which a print could fail and how to remedy them using Cura settings.

aliasing.label: Aliasing
aliasing.description: Limited stepper resolution is producing a jagged pattern in straight walls.

bed_adhesion_problems.label: Bed Adhesion Problems
bed_adhesion_problems.description: The print got loose from the build plate while the print was still going on.

elephants_foot.label: Elephant's Foot
elephants_foot.description: The bottom layer(s) of the print is a bit wider than the rest.

layer_shift.label: Layer Shift
layer_shift.description: Layers are not properly stacked on top of each other.

layer_splitting.label: Layer Splitting
layer_splitting.description: Layers don't stick to each other and split open.

missing_parts.label: Missing Parts
missing_parts.description: Some parts of the model are missing from the final print.

overextrusion.label: Overextrusion
overextrusion.description: Too much material is being extruded, causing the surface to become irregular and rough.

pillowing.label: Pillowing
pillowing.description: The top side is showing bulges or holes in between the infill lines.

ringing.label: Ringing
ringing.description: There is a ripple effect on flat surfaces next to small details.

scarring.label: Scarring
scarring.description: There are visible lines on the top or bottom side that don't belong to the top/bottom pattern.

seam.label: Seam
seam.description: A surface defect where the contour is started and closed.

stringing.label: Stringing
stringing.description: There are strings of plastic in places where the nozzle travels from one place to another.

topography.label: Topography
topography.description: The borders between the layers are visible on the top or bottom side.

underextrusion.label: Underextrusion
underextrusion.description: The printer is not extrusing enough material to make a strong, solid object.

unfinished_print.label: Unfinished Print
unfinished_print.description: The print is only partly completed.

warping.label: Warping
warping.description: The print curls up due to shrinkage when it cools down.

preferences.label: Preferences
preferences.description: Adjust the behaviour of this plug-in.

contributors.label: Contributors
contributors.description: Everyone that helped in creating this plug-in.
